text: An epitaph is a short text honouring a deceased person. Strictly speaking, it is text that is carved on a tombstone or plaque. Usually it gives the personâ€™s name and dates of birth and death. Some epitaphs say what the person did, and other things. Some people write their own epitaphs before they die. == Related pages == *Eulogy Category:Death customs Category:Writing
title: Epitaph
